title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with braided stem terminating in ball base. Core is braided over with linen yarns worked in groups to form a basket-weave effect. From both the stem and the base hang braided and knotted elements featuring knotted balls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-63.
